scripts.build:local: npm run clean:build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --config config/local/webpack.config.ts && npm run config-transform:local
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean:build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --config config/dev/webpack.config.ts && npm run config-transform:dev
scripts.build:stage: npm run clean:build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --config config/stage/webpack.config.ts && npm run config-transform:stage
scripts.build:electron: npm run build:local && npm run copy-files:electron
scripts.start:web: npm run build:local && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack serve --config config/local/webpack.config.ts
scripts.start:web-dev: npm run build:dev && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack serve --config config/dev/webpack.config.ts
scripts.start:web-stage: npm run build:stage && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack serve --config config/stage/webpack.config.ts
scripts.start:web-prod: npm run build:prod && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack serve --config config/prod/webpack.config.ts
scripts.start:ios: npm run build:all && npx cap open ios
scripts.start:android: npm run build:all && npx cap open android
scripts.watch:dev: npm run clean:build-electron && npm run config-transform:dev -- --destination=../electron/app && cross-env NODE_ENV=development ELECTRON_BUILD_OUTPUT_TYPE=electron webpack --config config/dev/webpack.config.ts --watch
scripts.watch:stage: npm run clean:build-electron && npm run config-transform:stage -- --destination=../electron/app && cross-env NODE_ENV=development ELECTRON_BUILD_OUTPUT_TYPE=electron webpack --config config/stage/webpack.config.ts --watch
scripts.watch:prod: npm run clean:build-electron && npm run config-transform:prod -- --destination=../electron/app && cross-env NODE_ENV=production ELECTRON_BUILD_OUTPUT_TYPE=electron webpack --config config/prod/webpack.config.ts --watch
